flawed_nl_solution:
If the solver got a head in 65 of the 211 flips, he got 211-65 =<<211-65=147>>147 tails
The number of tails than he got more than head is 147-65=<<147-65=82>>82

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 146, not 147. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
